Question: Rerun does not reveal whether this person kicks the ball or not.
Hints: And in the TV special, Someday You'll Find Her, this person, Linus tells this person that he gets a new true love every week.
Snoopy is this person's dog, and they have a strange relationship.
This person also has a problem of letting people take advantage of him, or not sticking up for himself when people pick on him.
